artist: Engraver: Peter de Jode, the Younger; Painter: After Ferdinand Elle; Publisher: Jan Meyssens
description: half length portrati of man facing left looking at viewer holding a glove in right hand; wearing cloak, jacket and high flat white collar
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [ 109 PETRUS DE JODE/ a esté tres bon engraveur, et dessigneur tres illustre; il a faicit plusiers/ chefs des ouvresilia long temps demeure á Rome, et en lan 1601 retournoit/ en Anvers, ville desa naissance ayant et pour maistre Henri Goltz. il/ morut l\"an 1634 le 9 d\'auoust/ M. Ferdinand pinxit   P. ds Jode Junior sculpsit  Ja. Meyssens excudit]; on sheet in pencil: [1-584]
portfolio: From Image de divers hommed (1649)/ The true effigies of the most eminent painters (1705)
title: Portrait of Petrus de Jode
